last_cycle.summary: Seventh audit cycle. Both cycle-6 recommendations (#23, #24) accepted and closed. Phase 0 QC gate cleared (QC #114). Phase 1 TS scaffold dispatched (#269, PR #270 open). Performed detailed code review of PR #270 — high quality, faithful PHP port, follows AGENTS-ts.md conventions. Filed 1 new recommendation: #26 (CI bootstrap blind spot for first workflow-introducing PR). Acceptance rate improved to 88%.
